titleStmt.title: The maidens reply to the young mans resolution. Wherein she fits him in his kind, and lets him know her setled mind, she can as well live single and not marry as well as he without a wife can tarry. To the tune of The young mans resolution.

The maidens reply to the young mans resolution. Wherein she fits him in his kind, and lets him know her setled mind, she can as well live single and not marry as well as he without a wife can tarry. To the tune of The young mans resolution.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for J. Williamson at the Bible upon London Bridge.,

notesStmt.note: Date and place of publication suggested by Wing.
Verse: "Come prethee young man do not ..."
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University, Houghton Library and the British Library.
